channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: RAA to Sponsor “College Discovery” Webinar September 11
item.description: In partnership with RPI’s Offices of Alumni Engagement and Enrollment Management, the Rensselaer Alumni Association will present a “College Discovery” webinar from 7:00PM to 8:30PM on Wednesday, September 11, covering a range of important topics for alumni who are preparing their children for the college selection, recruitment, and admissions process.
item.author: Community

item.title: Updated Laboratory Safety Course Available in Percipio
item.description: Environmental Health & Safety (EHS), in collaboration with Human Resources, has updated Rensselaer’s laboratory safety course, which is an important part of Rensselaer’s overall safety program and provides the campus community with resources for conducting laboratory activities in a safe and efficient manner. Students, faculty and staff who work in laboratory and research spaces are required to take Rensselaer’s Laboratory Safety Series, which is now available in Percipio.
item.author: Community

item.title: Information Session for 2025 Project RFP: Quantum Computing Track 4 to be Held August 16
item.description: From 1:00PM to 3:00PM on Friday, August 16, RPI and IBM representatives will discuss details of the Track 4 RFP and answer questions regarding the scope and process for this call. Registration is required to participate; please contact Kathy Fontaine if you have questions.
item.author: Community

item.title: Multimedia Services Announces Mediasite Capture Now Available to Faculty, Staff
item.description: Multimedia Services is pleased to announce that Mediasite Capture is now available to staff and faculty through MyMediasite. Capture allows recording of video through a browser without installing any additional software. Please refer to ITSSC for more information on Mediasite Capture.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Invite CCPD to Your Classroom or Club/Organization!
item.description: If you’re looking to inspire and prepare students for the professional world, Rensselaer’s Center for Career Development is here to help! CCPD’s team provides tailored presentations on a range of career-related topics, and can come into your class, club, or organizations meeting to present on a topic of your choosing.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Fac/Staff Quick Learn Webinar to Offer Tips for Engaging Students
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, August 21, 2024 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM - Assigning reading assignments and micro video lectures prior to class are great ways for students to gather initial knowledge. Register to join Maureen Fodera, of the Office of Undergraduate Education, as she offers tips on how instructors can use these means to engage and motivate students and help them extract important details/understandings….
